extendedInfo.description: With "Run Trainer" Dreamix Studio has won the Best Sports App of 2010 Award in the 'active sports' category for Features, Interaction and Design! And now it's also available for all Android users. This app is linked to a free Online Platform:www.runtrainer.comRun Trainer for Android support both 800x480 and the new 1280x720 resolutions! not scaled for the 480x320 resolution.Are you thinking about improving your health, but you donât have a lot of time? Work is in the way of finally joining the gym you'd said you join? All those good intentions you had are slipping away...Stop sitting around on your couch and start running with your personal coach that is waiting in your Android device! No need to pay a lot for a coach or gym membership, this app trains you to become a skillful runner without hurting yourself. This application will assist you in running 5K, 10K, 15K or 20K in just 10 weeks each with 30 professional training sessions for just $2,99, no additional costs! Lose weight and get in shape!You create your own running playlist and while running a guiding voice will tell you exactly what to do. Meanwhile it tracks where you are on Maps, how fast you are going, how many calories are burned and off course the distance. And when you're done you can share your run on your favorite Social Media, or not.After your done with the run just Sync it to the online Run Trainer platform and have all your stats ready for you on the web!You can now instantly join over 200,000 people that have already started running with the schedules from world-famous running coach Mieke Boeckx. She is also the founder of the international âStart to RunÂ®â initiative and we from Dreamix Studio have build this app to provide you these schedules on your iOS device.Already running like a pro? Track your runs and share these with friends.This App includes: Free Run, Music player integration, Create a profile, Statistics, Social Media and GPS tracking. Additional training schedules are available as in-app purchases, But the first week is FREE to try!â Learn to run 5/10/15 and 20Kâ Voice guide that takes you through the trainingâ Music player integrationâ Statistics and Syncing to runtrainer.comâ Customize your Settingsâ Share with Twitter and Facebookâ GPS live trackingâ Track distance / Calories burnt / (Average) Speed

reviews.title: Terrible company awful app
reviews.comment: this program is so full of bugs .  I contacted the developer  to find out why it kept trying to charge me for unlocking part of the application.  \"purchase failed\" is what I kept getting.  no response to either of the emails that I sent .  the application also crashes . it could be a really great app if these things were fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Insulting and expensive
reviews.comment: The birth year stops at 1970, so I guess your opinion is that over that age you\'re too old to run? I wanted to try something different that the doublerun but it is still the best at a better price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This app makes you pay for everything but a demo. Uninstalled immediately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: i want an app
reviews.comment: i don\'t want an internet link where i have to create an account. can\'t change to imperial units.
